name: IT-O (Eyetee-Oh) (V)
Lore: 'Floating prisoner interrogation droid. Uses probes and needles to dispense truth drugs and perform ''surgery.'' Sensors determine subject''s pain threshold and truthfulness.',
Text: 'Wherever you have a captive, your Force drains are +2. Once per game, may deploy Hypo from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to Restraining Bolt and attrition < 3.',
